# Hohmann and Barnard

**Website:** [www.h-b.com](https://www.h-b.com)

This section organizes Hohmann and Barnard products that are relevant to masonry and concrete facade work.

- **Masonry Anchors** — Anchoring systems for various masonry applications.
- **Wall Ties** — Structural ties for cavity wall construction.
- **Accessories** — Supporting hardware and installation tools.
